Do not download this torrent.
The eboot is encrypted and can't be read by backup manager yet.  Guess you will be able to run this in the future, but there is currently no way to run this on a PSjailbreaked PS3

PS3 can be hacked using loads of external devices (iPhone, N900 etc). Check out PS3-HACKS.com for the latest news and instructions on how to JailBreak the PS3.

Once hacked, you copy these files to GAMEZ folder on a FAT32 external drive plugged into your PS3. No need to burn to a disk. Run through 'Backup Manager' and that's it.

Yes, Firmware 3.42 blocks this JailBreak and you will not currently be able to use PSN if you have hacked the PS3. None of the bothers me as I am on 3.41 and playing loads of new games!!!!
